title: 台湾反渗透法出笼 蔡英文签署公布
contents:
台湾反渗透法出笼 蔡英文签署公布
[url=https://www.facebook.com/dialog/share?app_id=113191652055439&href=http%3A%2F%2Frfi.my%2F5CAX.F&redirect_uri=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.rfi.fr%2Fcn%2F%25E6%25B8%25AF%25E6%25BE%25B3%25E5%258F%25B0%2F20200115-%25E5%258F%25B0%25E6%25B9%25BE%25E5%258F%258D%25E6%25B8%2597%25E9%2580%258F%25E6%25B3%2595%25E5%2587%25BA%25E7%25AC%25BC-%25E8%2594%25A1%25E8%258B%25B1%25E6%2596%2587%25E7%25AD%25BE%25E7%25BD%25B2%25E5%2585%25AC%25E5%25B8%2583&locale=zh_CN][/url][url=https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http%3A%2F%2Frfi.my%2F5CAX.T&via=RFI_Cn&related=RFI_Cn&text=%E5%8F%B0%E6%B9%BE%E5%8F%8D%E6%B8%97%E9%80%8F%E6%B3%95%E5%87%BA%E7%AC%BC%20%E8%94%A1%E8%8B%B1%E6%96%87%E7%AD%BE%E7%BD%B2%E5%85%AC%E5%B8%83&lang=zh-cn][/url][url=fb-messenger://share?link=http%3A%2F%2Frfi.my%2F5CAX.S&app_id=113191652055439][/url][url=whatsapp://send?text=%E5%8F%B0%E6%B9%BE%E5%8F%8D%E6%B8%97%E9%80%8F%E6%B3%95%E5%87%BA%E7%AC%BC%20%E8%94%A1%E8%8B%B1%E6%96%87%E7%AD%BE%E7%BD%B2%E5%85%AC%E5%B8%83%20-%20http%3A%2F%2Frfi.my%2F5CAX.W][/url][url=https://share.flipboard.com/bookmarklet/popout?title=%E5%8F%B0%E6%B9%BE%E5%8F%8D%E6%B8%97%E9%80%8F%E6%B3%95%E5%87%BA%E7%AC%BC%20%E8%94%A1%E8%8B%B1%E6%96%87%E7%AD%BE%E7%BD%B2%E5%85%AC%E5%B8%83&url=http%3A%2F%2Frfi.my%2F5CAX.P][/url]
发表时间： 15/01/2020 - 13:45
作者：古莉

台湾《反渗透法》出炉，蔡英文总统今天1月15日签署并公布。自称共谍的王立强向澳媒透露北京渗透台湾影响当地政治，导致蔡英文政府推动出台该法。

原文 RFI - 法国国际广播电台
https://amp.rfi.fr/cn/%E6%B8%AF%E6%BE%B3%E5%8F%B0/20200115-%E5%8F%B0%E6%B9%BE%E5%8F%8D%E6%B8%97%E9%80%8F%E6%B3%95%E5%87%BA%E7%AC%BC-%E8%94%A1%E8%8B%B1%E6%96%87%E7%AD%BE%E7%BD%B2%E5%85%AC%E5%B8%83

更新：由于我当时发表引用前未充分考虑到版权问题，现在也不想跟新闻媒体联络以得到允许，所以移除了原文内容和存档链接。请尊重新闻版权。
